entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
